io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction

Enum HashType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<HashType>
      • io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction.HashType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<HashType>

    public enum HashType
extends java.lang.Enum<HashType>
    Enum containing hash type.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      HASH_160
      hashed twice: first with SHA-256, then with RIPEMD-160, then add 12 bytes of 0s (BTC Compat)
      HASH_256
      Hashed twice with SHA-256 (BTC Compat)
      KECCAK_256
      hashed using Keccak-256 (ETH Compat)
      SHA3_256
      hashed using SHA3-256 (Network Native)
